Uses of Package
ca.uqac.lif.cep.xml

  • Packages that use ca.uqac.lif.cep.xml 
    Package Description
    ca.uqac.lif.cep.xml
    Processors to perform XML parsing and evaluate simple XPath expressions.
  • Classes in ca.uqac.lif.cep.xml used by ca.uqac.lif.cep.xml 
    Class and Description
    XmlFeeder
    Processor that turns input strings into output XML documents
    XmlFeeder.XmlParsingFunction
    Function that converts a string into an XML element
    XmlReader
    Splits an input stream into chunks of XML, and parses each chunk into an XmlElement
    XmlReader.XmlTokenFeeder
    Inner processor splitting the string into chunks
    XPathFunction
    Function that converts a string into an XML element
    XPathFunctionGet
    Utility function to evaluate an XPath expression, ending with a text() element
    XPathFunctionGetNumber
    Utility function to evaluate an XPath expression, ending with a text() element
    XPathFunctionGetText
    Utility function to evaluate an XPath expression, ending with a text() element
